content.raw:
@{5b9791e8a9fd6d2c834b5864} , I believe these are the outstanding comments:

* Avoid the `cameras` namespace for consistency \(if you all agree\).
* Update the `.rviz` config files. You’ll need to update the topics.
* Update `wamv_gazebo/launch/localization_example.launch` . This is needed for running rviz and needs to be updated with the new GPS and IMU topics.
content.html:
@Jonathan Wheare , I believe these are the outstanding comments:

  • Avoid the cameras namespace for consistency (if you all agree).
  • Update the .rviz config files. You’ll need to update the topics.
  • Update wamv_gazebo/launch/localization_example.launch . This is needed for running rviz and needs to be updated with the new GPS and IMU topics.
